name: ScrollArea
description: Custom scrollbar container with consistent styling across browsers and configurable visibility

accessibility.screenReader: Native scroll behavior is preserved. Content remains accessible. Custom scrollbars do not interfere with assistive technology. Focus management within scrollable area works as expected.
knownLimitations: Custom scrollbar styling may not be visible to users who have system-wide scrollbar preferences

recommendedUsage: Use to provide consistent scrollbar appearance across browsers. Configure visibility type (auto, always, hover, scroll) based on UX needs. Support both vertical and horizontal scrolling.
antiPatterns: Do not hide scrollbars completely as it removes important affordance. Avoid nested scroll areas. Ensure sufficient contrast for scrollbar visibility.
